apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the currency code of the locale.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Returns the currency code of the locale.
For example, for "zh-Hant-HK", returns "HKD".

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the currency symbol of the locale.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
Returns the currency symbol of the locale.
For example, for "zh-Hant-HK", returns "HK$".

apiValue.shortdesc: Returns the identifier of the locale.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Returns the identifier of the locale.

apiValue.shortdesc: A constant indicating the discount type is an introductory offer.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: A constant indicating the discount type is an introductory offer.

apiValue.shortdesc: A constant indicating the discount type is a subscription offer.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: A constant indicating the discount type is a subscription offer.

apiValue.shortdesc: The lengths of the downloadable files available for this product.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The lengths of the downloadable files available for this product.

apiValue.shortdesc: A string that identifies which version of the content is available for download.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
A string that identifies which version of the content is available for download.
The version string is formatted as a series of integers separated by periods.

apiValue.shortdesc: The object containing introductory price information for the product.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
The object containing introductory price information for the product.
If you've set up introductory prices in App Store Connect, the introductory price property will be populated. This property is null if the product has no introductory price. Before displaying UI that offers the introductory price, you must first determine if the user is eligible to receive it. See Implementing Introductory Offers in Your App for information on determining eligibility and displaying introductory prices. iOS 11.2+

apiValue.shortdesc: A description of the product.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: A description of the product.

apiValue.shortdesc: The cost of the product in the local currency.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The cost of the product in the local currency.

apiValue.shortdesc: The name of the product.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The name of the product.

apiValue.shortdesc: The locale used to format the price of the product.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The locale used to format the price of the product.

apiValue.shortdesc: The cost of the product in the local currency.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The cost of the product in the local currency.

apiValue.shortdesc: The string that identifies the product to the Apple App Store.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The string that identifies the product to the Apple App Store.

apiValue.shortdesc: The identifier of the subscription group to which the subscription belongs.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
The identifier of the subscription group to which the subscription belongs.
All auto-renewable subscriptions must be a part of a group. You create the group identifiers in App Store Connect. This property is null if the Product is not an auto-renewable subscription. iOS 12.0+

apiValue.shortdesc: The period details for products that are subscriptions.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
The period details for products that are subscriptions.
This read-only property is null if the product is not a subscription. A subscription period is described in terms of a unit and the number of units that make up a single period. iOS 11.2+

apiValue.shortdesc: For a transaction that was canceled by Apple customer support, the time and date of the cancellation.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: For a transaction that was canceled by Apple customer support, the time and date of the cancellation. Treat a canceled receipt the same as if no purchase had ever been made.

apiValue.shortdesc: For a transaction that restores a previous transaction, the date of the original transaction.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: For a transaction that restores a previous transaction, the date of the original transaction. This value corresponds to the original transaction’s transactionDate property. In an auto-renewable subscription receipt, this indicates the beginning of the subscription period, even if the subscription has been renewed.

apiValue.shortdesc: For a transaction that restores a previous transaction, the transaction identifier of the original transaction.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: For a transaction that restores a previous transaction, the transaction identifier of the original transaction. Otherwise, identical to the transaction identifier. This value corresponds to the original transaction’s transactionIdentifier property. All receipts in a chain of renewals for an auto-renewable subscription have the same value for this field.

apiValue.shortdesc: The product identifier of the item that was purchased.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The product identifier of the item that was purchased. This value corresponds to the productIdentifier property of the SKPayment object stored in the transaction’s payment property.

apiValue.shortdesc: The date and time that the item was purchased.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The date and time that the item was purchased. This value corresponds to the transaction’s transactionDate property.

apiValue.shortdesc: The number of items purchased.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The number of items purchased. This value corresponds to the quantity property of the SKPayment object stored in the transaction’s payment property.

apiValue.shortdesc: The expiration date for the subscription, expressed as the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The expiration date for the subscription, expressed as the number of milliseconds since January 1, 1970, 00:00:00 GMT. This key is only present for auto-renewable subscription receipts.

apiValue.shortdesc: The transaction identifier of the item that was purchased.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The transaction identifier of the item that was purchased. This value corresponds to the transaction’s transactionIdentifier property.

apiValue.shortdesc: The primary key for identifying subscription purchases.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The primary key for identifying subscription purchases.

apiValue.shortdesc: Download is actively downloading

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Download is actively downloading

apiValue.shortdesc: Download was cancelled

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Download was cancelled

apiValue.shortdesc: Download failed

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Download failed

apiValue.shortdesc: Download is finished, content is available

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Download is finished, content is available

apiValue.shortdesc: Download was paused by the user

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Download was paused by the user

apiValue.shortdesc: Download is inactive, waiting to be downloaded

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Download is inactive, waiting to be downloaded

apiValue.shortdesc: Error when decoding response

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Error when decoding response

apiValue.shortdesc: Error when proceeding request

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Error when proceeding request

apiValue.shortdesc: No receipt data

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: No receipt data

apiValue.shortdesc: No data received

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: No data received

apiValue.shortdesc: Receive invalid - bad status returned

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Receive invalid - bad status returned

apiValue.shortdesc: Error when encoding HTTP body into JSON

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Error when encoding HTTP body into JSON

apiValue.shortdesc: A string used to uniquely identify a discount offer for a product.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
A string used to uniquely identify a discount offer for a product.
You set up offers and their identifiers in App Store Connect.

apiValue.shortdesc: An integer that indicates the number of periods the product discount is available.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An integer that indicates the number of periods the product discount is available.

apiValue.shortdesc: The payment mode for this product discount.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The payment mode for this product discount.

apiValue.shortdesc: The locale used to format the discount price of the product.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The locale used to format the discount price of the product.

apiValue.shortdesc: The discount price of the product in the local currency.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The discount price of the product in the local currency.

apiValue.shortdesc: An object that defines the period for the product discount.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: An object that defines the period for the product discount.

apiValue.shortdesc: The type of discount offer.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The type of discount offer.

apiValue.shortdesc: The transaction is in the queue, but its final status is pending external action.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The transaction is in the queue, but its final status is pending external action.

apiValue.shortdesc: Transaction was cancelled or failed before being added to the server queue.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Transaction was cancelled or failed before being added to the server queue.

apiValue.shortdesc: Transaction is in queue, user has been charged.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Transaction is in queue, user has been charged. Client should complete the transaction.

apiValue.shortdesc: Transaction is being added to the server queue.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Transaction is being added to the server queue.

apiValue.shortdesc: Transaction was restored from user's purchase history.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Transaction was restored from user's purchase history. Client should complete the transaction.

apiValue.shortdesc: The purchase id associated with this transaction

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The purchase id associated with this transaction

apiValue.shortdesc: The App Store could not read the JSON object you provided.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The App Store could not read the JSON object you provided.

apiValue.shortdesc: The data in the receipt-data property was malformed or missing.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The data in the receipt-data property was malformed or missing.

apiValue.shortdesc: No status returned

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: No status returned

apiValue.shortdesc: This receipt is from the production environment, but it was sent to the test environment for verification.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: This receipt is from the production environment, but it was sent to the test environment for verification. Send it to the production environment instead.

apiValue.shortdesc: The receipt could not be authenticated.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The receipt could not be authenticated.

apiValue.shortdesc: The receipt server is not currently available.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The receipt server is not currently available.

apiValue.shortdesc: The shared secret you provided does not match the shared secret on file for your account.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: The shared secret you provided does not match the shared secret on file for your account.

apiValue.shortdesc: This receipt is valid but the subscription has expired.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: This receipt is valid but the subscription has expired. When this status code is returned to your server, the receipt data is also decoded and returned as part of the response.

apiValue.shortdesc: This receipt is from the test environment, but it was sent to the production environment for verification.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: This receipt is from the test environment, but it was sent to the production environment for verification. Send it to the test environment instead.

apiValue.shortdesc: Not decodable status

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Not decodable status

apiValue.shortdesc: valid statu

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: valid statu

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The payment mode indicates if the discount price is charged one time, multiple times, or if the discount is a free trial.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The payment mode indicates if the discount price is charged one time, multiple times, or if the discount is a free trial. The payment mode may determine the wording you choose to phrase the offer in your app's UI.

apiValue.shortdesc: A constant that indicates that the payment mode is a free trial.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
A constant that indicates that the payment mode is a free trial.
With a free trial payment mode, the price is 0, so users pay nothing during the discount period.

apiValue.shortdesc: A constant indicating that the payment mode of a product discount is billed over a single or multiple billing periods.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
A constant indicating that the payment mode of a product discount is billed over a single or multiple billing periods.
With a pay as you go payment mode, users pay the discounted price at each billing period during the discount period.

apiValue.shortdesc: A constant indicating that the payment mode of a product discount is paid up front.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc:
A constant indicating that the payment mode of a product discount is paid up front.
With a pay up front payment mode, users pay the discounted price one time, and receive the product for duration of the discount period.
